Package com.github.actionfx.core.utils

Class BooleanBindingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.utils.BooleanBindingBuilder
  • public class BooleanBindingBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for creating a BooleanBinding for one or many Controls or Observables.

    This builder allows to create boolean bindings based on chained predicates of form: 

     boolean_value = NOT? (NOT? predicate1 [AND|OR] NOT? predicate2 [AND|OR] predicate3 ....)
    The predicates themselves again are evaluated against a list of "testables", where you can chose, whether the predicate needs to be true for all testables or only for at least one testable. (see BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp).
    Author:
    koster

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp
      Enum describes whether a predicate must match all testables or at least one testable.
      static class  BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateBuilder<T>
      Builder class for creating a single predicate meant to be addded to a larger predicate chain.
      protected static class  BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateElement<T>
      Represents a single predicate that can be chained together with other predicates.

      • addPredicate

        public <T> BooleanBindingBuilder addPredicate​(BooleanOp booleanOp,
                                              java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate,
                                              java.util.function.Function<T,​javafx.beans.Observable> observableExtractorFuntion,
                                              BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp matchingOp,
                                              T[] testables,
                                              boolean negateResult)
        Adds a single predicate to this chain builder, using the supplied booleanOp to connect it to a previously added predicate. This method accepts all types of "testables", as long as you can retrieve the Observable with a supplied observableExtractorFuntion.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of testable
        Parameters:
        booleanOp - the boolean operation to link this predicate to a previously added predicate. In case no predicate has been added before, this value is ignored / not relevant for processing.
        predicate - the predicate that shall be applied to all testables
        observableExtractorFuntion - a function that targets at retrieving the observable value from the testable
        matchingOp - the matching operation, i.e. shall all testables fullfil the predicate, or at least one?
        testables - the testable objects that the predicate will be applied on
        negateResult - flag that determines whether the matching result over all testable shall be negated or not
        Returns:
        the boolean binding builder

      • addPredicate

        public BooleanBindingBuilder addPredicate​(BooleanOp booleanOp,
                                          java.util.function.Predicate<javafx.beans.Observable> predicate,
                                          BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp matchingOp,
                                          javafx.beans.Observable[] testables,
                                          boolean negateResult)
        Adds a single predicate to this chain builder, using the supplied booleanOp to connect it to a previously added predicate. This method is specialized on accepting Observables as the "testable".
        Parameters:
        booleanOp - the boolean operation to link this predicate to a previously added predicate. In case no predicate has been added before, this value is ignored / not relevant for processing.
        predicate - the predicate that shall be applied to all testables
        matchingOp - the matching operation, i.e. shall all testables fullfil the predicate, or at least one?
        testables - the testable objects that the predicate will be applied on
        negateResult - flag that determines whether the matching result over all testable shall be negated or not
        Returns:
        the boolean binding builder

        public BooleanBindingBuilder negateChainResult​(boolean negateChainResult)

        public javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding build()
        Builds the actual BooleanBinding with the parameters specified in this BooleanBindingBuilder instance.
        Returns:
        the constructed boolean binding
